title: RBI proposes new norms for LSPs to promote transparency
description: LSP is an agent of a regulated entity (RE) who carries out one or more of lender's functions or part thereof in customer acquisition, underwriting support, pricing support, servicing, monitoring, recovery of specific loan or loan portfolio on behalf of REs in conformity with extant outsourcing guidelines.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
